product_description: Made of durable denim, this military-meets-workwear jacket has wide sleeves, patch pockets and a drawstring that can be cinched for waist-flattering shape.
product_details_and_care:
Made of durable denim, this military-meets-workwear jacket has wide sleeves, patch pockets and a drawstring that can be cinched for waist-flattering shape.
25" length (size Medium)
Front button closure
Chest button-patch pockets
Drawstring waist
